title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: every week i dont see doom bots is another week where I die a little inside
Will doom bots ever be on this rotation?

Dear L4T3NCY,

 I would like to ask if the 5v5 Bilgewater game mode would ever possibly be considered as a week end game mode in the rotating game queue, because I thought it was one of the best and added in extra strategies on how to push and win.

Yo! Sure, any mode we've previously done is a potential candidate to go into the RGM queue. So, Doom Bots, Black Market Brawlers, etc. We're still optimising the process for maintaining the current stable of modes and just added Definitely Not Dominion as a 'newish' mode, so I can't make any promises for when they might come.

I'm personally interested in extending the queue beyond the weekend atm (no ETA), so maybe after that we'll have a look.
Awesome to know thank you for the reply L4t3ncy

Favourite Modes:
-Urf
-One for All

Will the rotating game mode queue be available on a weekly/monthly basis?
And yes please make them last longer (and the whole weekend, not specific times, as in OCE youll only be able to start playing around midday)
